ASTRO / Hiroshi Hasegawa.title: Idioblast
ASTRO / Hiroshi Hasegawa.about:
"In 2005 a small Russian label, Insofar Vapour Bulk, proposed to Massimo Magrini to work on a recording made by Hiroshi Hasegawa (Astro). It was a "drone-like" sound of a few minutes, Despite the difficult nature of the assignment, Massimo loved the very static and cryptic structure of the original. So, starting from this basic recording (without using additional sounds) he developed a 45 minutes long suite: it was like using a magic audio lens which revealed a myriad of hidden details in a microscopic world. The original Astro sound can still be heard at the beginning and at the end of the suite". 



The reissue comes in a cardboard case with silver-embossed printing and doesn't include the screensaver, wallpaper and extra Astro file from the original release.
ASTRO / Hiroshi Hasegawa.credits:
released February 5, 2021
            
            originally recorded, composed, mixed and mastered by Massimo Magrini (Bad Sector) and Hiroshi Hasegawa (ASTRO) 2004-2005.



re-mix and re-organized by Massimo Magrini (Bad Sector) 2012.
